abstract: The Red Bulls will open the M.L.S. postseason on Wednesday night with a one-game playoff against Dallas in Frisco, Tex.
snippet: The Red Bulls will open the M.L.S. postseason on Wednesday night with a one-game playoff against Dallas in Frisco, Tex.
lead_paragraph: LITTLE FALLS, N.J. - There are many things Thierry Henry has come to terms with since joining the Red Bulls from Barcelona last year. But Major League Soccer's playoff system will never be one of them.

headline.main: M.L.S. Playoffs Still Foreign to Red Bulls Star
